name: Blue Star
tagline: When time and worlds collide, a story about entropy...
body:
Earth-Year 971 of the 24th era of solage II: Planet PX842-E# discovered and classified as a Q-type B2 planet orbiting SX842 recently notified as blue dwarf star by migratory telescope.

Earth-Year 976 of the of the 24th era of solage II: Pal-One Senate denies approval to PX842-E# colonial plan and edicts a planet starmap removal d√©cret. Senate Iondile's full statement "...What? A blue dwarf? What is this stupid algorithm saying... I'm sending this to science department. This should be a mistake, Next!".

...And that's basically how manking ended, you can blame poor paperwork.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
